scripts.build-js: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-class-properties transform-object-rest-spread ] ] --debug client/main.js -o server/public/bundle.js
scripts.watch-js: watchify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-class-properties transform-object-rest-spread ] ] --debug client/main.js -o server/public/bundle.js
